4.1.1.1.4. src.IOT_GUI_EditSegmentationTools module¶

-- coding: utf-8 --

File: IOT_GUI_EditSegmentationTools.py

Class IOT_GUI_EditSegmentationTools

A frame (QGroupBox) for accessing the editing segmentation tools (IOT_OperationEditSegmentation)

IOT stands for INAOE OCT Tools

Log:
Date Author Description
27-Aug-2018 FOE
  • Class created.
  • Added initial groups for COI and ROI based manipulations.
  • Added buttons for initial operations; Delete and ChangeLabel
30-Aug-2018 FOE
  • Incorporated buttons other editing operations.
23-Sep-2018 FOE
  • Updated comments and added Sphinx documentation to the class
